questions.question: The amount of energy needed to melt 'm' gram of a solid substance to its liquid form is

answers.a: $Q= mCdT$, where C is the Specific heat capacity of the substance
answers.b: $Q=mLf$ ,where Lf is the Latent heat of fusion of the substance
answers.c: $Q=(T_{2}^{4}-T_{1}^{4})$, where T1 and T2 are the temperatures of the body and the surroundings
